snippet: The assailant, who attacked a bus driver as well as passengers during the morning rush, was shot and wounded by security forces as he tried to escape. At least three victims had serious injuries.
abstract: Palestinian man identified as Hamza Muhammad Hassan Matrouk boards bus in Tel Aviv and stabs and wounds up to a dozen Israeli passengers; police shoot and wound Hassan as he attempts to flee scene, eventually capturing him.

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and IRIT PAZNER GARSHOWITZ

lead_paragraph: The assailant, who attacked a bus driver as well as passengers during the morning rush, was shot and wounded by security forces as he tried to escape. At least three victims had serious injuries.

headline.main: Stabbing on Tel Aviv Bus Breaks a Fragile Calm
headline.print_headline: Stabbing on Tel Aviv Bus Breaks a Fragile Calm
